scripts.dev: concurrently -n common,frontend -c magenta,cyan "npm --workspace=common run dev" "npm --workspace=frontend run dev"
scripts.dev-with-server: concurrently -n common,frontend,server -c magenta,cyan,green "npm --workspace=common run dev" "npm --workspace=frontend run dev-with-server" "npm --workspace=server run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace=common run build && npm --workspace=frontend run build && npm --workspace=server run build
